爆.definition: to explode or burst; to quick fry or quick boil

爆冷.definition: an upset (esp. in sports); unexpected turn of events; to pull off a coup; a breakthrough

爆冷門.definition: an upset (esp. in sports); unexpected turn of events; to pull off a coup; a breakthrough

爆冷門兒.definition: erhua variant of 爆冷門|爆冷门[bao4 leng3 men2]

爆出.definition: to burst out; to appear unexpectedly; to break (media story)

爆擊.definition: variant of 暴擊|暴击[bao4 ji1]

爆滿.definition: filled to capacity (of theater, stadium, gymnasium etc)

爆火.definition: to skyrocket in popularity; to go viral

爆炒.definition: to stir-fry rapidly using a high flame; to conduct a media blitz; to manipulate a stock market through large-scale buying and selling

爆炸.definition: explosion; to explode; to blow up; to detonate

爆炸力.definition: explosive force; strength of an explosion

爆照.definition: (Internet slang) to post a photo of oneself online

爆發.definition: to break out; to erupt; to explode; to burst out

爆破.definition: to blow up; to demolish (using explosives); dynamite; blast

爆笑.definition: to burst out laughing; hilarious; burst of laughter

爆粗.definition: to say offensive words; to swear

爆紅.definition: to be a big hit; to be hugely popular

爆聲.definition: explosion; bang; sonic boom; engine knock

爆肚兒.definition: erhua variant of 爆肚[bao4 du3]

爆艙.definition: to run out of cargo space (on a ship or plane)

爆菊花.definition: (slang) to stick sth up the anus; to have anal intercourse

爆表.definition: off the charts; extreme; beyond the normal range of measurement

爆裂.definition: to rupture; to burst; to explode

爆金幣.definition: (gaming) (of a monster etc) to drop gold coins when defeated; (fig.) (slang) to give or spend money

爆雷.definition: (of a P2P lending platform) to collapse; (Tw) (slang) to reveal plot details; spoiler

爆頭.definition: (neologism) (slang) (often used in video gaming) to shoot sb in the head; headshot
